resources.string: Use this app to find out a little more about my friends!
I like swiping right and climbing mountains with the bois. Ramen is life, and you can\'t keep a good corn dog down. #EverestOneDay
My hobbies include the Python Lyfe, and making these guns look amazing. You see this hair? Stylin\' and profilin\'!
My hobbies include vaping, eating the food of my people, and stealing handles of other peoples liquor.
I\'m a home schooled vapey boi who loves long walks on Skellige Isle with Geralt of Rivia. 32 Vape Lyfe.
I\'m a skilled programmer with a lot of self confidence issues who doesn\'t believe what the bois say when they tell me I am the best programmer.
